name: The Good, the Bad, the Cyborg
name_original: The Good, the Bad, the Cyborg
description:
NARRATIVE CONTEXT INTRODUCTION

The Good, The Bad, The Cyborg, is a dexterity game based on quests and turn-based combat, set in the Cyberpunk-Western town of “Hollow Creek.” 

In this game, you take on the role of a mercenary who just arrived in town searching for a job, and found himself caught up in the mystery surrounding the town's mine, in which for some time now workers have entered without coming out…

Explore the mine, fight enemies, and find out the truth!

FEATURES LIST

Quests:

  • Talk with Hollow Creek’s inhabitants to pick up the main quest!
  • Follow the instructions given and advance with the story, slowly uncovering more about the mine’s situation and the town’s inhabitants themselves.

Fights:

  • Fight in random encounters when exploring the mine!
  • Aim for the center of the bar to get a “critical hit” and restore some HP.
  • Level up each time you defeat a boss.
  • Defeat all of them and reach the end of the story!
